;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.example.com. IN A

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.example.com. 86400 IN A 192.0.2.80

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
example.com. 86400 IN NS ns.example.com.

;; ADDITIONAL SECTION:
ns.example.com. 86400 IN A 192.0.2.1
